sentences.sentence: But evidence is now accruing to suggest that it is true.
sentences.translation: 但是现在越来越多的证据暗示这个观点再正确不过了。

sentences.sentence: Any expenses accruing from this credit inquiry will be gladly paid on receipt of your bill.
sentences.translation: 对此信用咨询所需任何费用，在接到帐单后即付。

sentences.sentence: The two tomes were due back a month later but were never returned and have been accruing late fees ever since.
sentences.translation: 这两本大部头书籍应在一个月后归还，但它们一去不回，自那时起，逾期不归还图书的罚金不断增加。
